title: Add verbose option for gradcheck to give more detailed information on why gradcheck failed
body_html:
This intends to address #2710. In #2710, it is proposed that a details namedtuple to be returned.
However, I find it much easier to work with printing failing information to stderr rather than returning a namedtuple since:

  1. We still return an error code so it does not break existing interface.
  2. It is much easier to simply terminate early once gradcheck failed.
  3. User who will be using this function will debug their code until gradcheck passes anyway.
